item.title: POWER RANGERS (2017) // Ludi Lin on His High School Crush
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: BAND WITH NO NAME Films was in the house for a press conference featuring Lionsgate’s upcoming Power Rangers movie!
item.content:encoded: BAND WITH NO NAME Films was in the house for a press conference featuring Lionsgate’s upcoming Power Rangers movie! Ludi Lin, who plays Zack aka The Black Ranger, talks about the original Japanese series as well as his first high school crush.

item.title: Columbus
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: Co-stars John Cho, Michelle Forbes, Haley Lu Richardson, Parker Posey, and Rory Culkin join director Kogonada sit down to
item.content:encoded:
Co-stars John Cho, Michelle Forbes, Haley Lu Richardson, Parker Posey, and Rory Culkin join director Kogonada sit down to discuss their new film ‘Columbus’, aptly named after its setting in Ohio.

The Korean-born son (John Cho) of an ailing architecture critic and the daughter (Haley Lu Richardson) of a recovering addict (Michelle Forbes) bond over their fears of losing a parent while both are temporarily stranded in Columbus, Indiana. Her passion for architecture creates an avenue for frank talk with each other about their situation.

https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/columbus_2017

item.title: Revenge of the Green Dragons
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: In the vein of crime classics like MEAN STREETS and INFERNAL AFFAIRS, REVENGE OF THE GREEN DRAGONS follows two
item.content:encoded: In the vein of crime classics like MEAN STREETS and INFERNAL AFFAIRS, REVENGE OF THE GREEN DRAGONS follows two immigrant brothers Sonny (Justin Chon) and Steven (Kevin Wu) who survive the impoverished despair of New York in the 1980s by joining Chinatown gang “The Green Dragons”. The brothers quickly rise up the ranks, drawing the unwanted attention of hard-boiled city cops. After an ill- fated love affair pits Sonny against his own brother, he sets out for revenge on the very gang who made him who he is. From acclaimed Director Andrew Lau and Andrew Loo, and legendary Executive Producer Martin Scorsese comes a brilliant mix between a Hong Kong action film and a New York City crime thriller, portraying the never-before-told true story of “The Green Dragons”.

item.title: Okja | Official Trailer [HD] | Netflix
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: Meet Mija, a young girl who risks everything to prevent a powerful, multi-national company from kidnapping her best friend
item.content:encoded: Meet Mija, a young girl who risks everything to prevent a powerful, multi-national company from kidnapping her best friend – a massive animal named Okja.

item.title: Why Doesn’t Hollywood Cast Asian Actors?
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: As the American entertainment industry continues its strategy of rebooting everything under the sun, it makes sense that they
item.content:encoded: As the American entertainment industry continues its strategy of rebooting everything under the sun, it makes sense that they would turn their sights on other cultures. For better or worse the West has always had an infatuation with Asian culture but it feels like there’s been an uptick in eastern and eastern themed stories for western audiences. And one controversy that seems to follow these controversies is who is cast in them. When telling stories using Asian characters for a western audience, do you cast based on the source material, on the race of the intended audience, or some other factor? The practice of casting characters of color to be played by caucasian actors has come to be called “whitewashing” which both includes and is distinct from “asian erasure.” And that’s what we’re going to talk about today with our friend Kevin Nguyen, editor at GQ.com who has written extensively about the issue.

item.title: Psy returns with two new music videos- ‘New Face’ and ‘I Luv it’
item.dc:creator: Engineer
item.description: Psy is back with his latest album ‘4×2=8‘. As with most of Psy’s music videos, the dancing and choreography does not
item.content:encoded:
Psy is back with his latest album ‘4×2=8‘. As with most of Psy’s music videos, the dancing and choreography does not disappoint.

He’s also accompanied by an army of beautiful white ladies in one of the scenes of ‘New Face’. It seems that he filmed in Las Vegas.

Check them out here:

item.title: Sophie and the Rising Sun
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: Set in the autumn of 1941 in Salty Creek, a fishing village in South Carolina, the film tells the
item.content:encoded: Set in the autumn of 1941 in Salty Creek, a fishing village in South Carolina, the film tells the dramatic story of interracial lovers swept up in the tides of history. As World War II rages in Europe a wounded Asian stranger, Mr. Ohta, appears in the town under mysterious circumstances. Sophie, a native of Salty Creek, quickly becomes transfixed by Mr. Ohta and a friendship born of their mutual love of art blossoms into a delicate and forbidden courtship. As their secret relationship evolves the war escalates tragically. When Pearl Harbor is bombed, a surge of misguided patriotism, bigotry and violence sweeps through the town, threatening Mr. Ohta’s life. A trio of women, each with her own secrets – Sophie, along with the town matriarch and her housekeeper – rejects law and propriety, risking their lives with their actions.

item.title: Keni Styles Asian Male Porn Star – (Mini Doc)
item.dc:creator: Ramen

item.title: THE BIG SICK Trailer
item.dc:creator: Ramen
item.description: Based on the real-life courtship between Kumail Nanjiani and Emily V. Gordon, THE BIG SICK tells the story of
item.content:encoded:
Based on the real-life courtship between Kumail Nanjiani and Emily V. Gordon, THE BIG SICK tells the story of Pakistan-born aspiring comedian Kumail, who connects with grad student Emily after one of his standup sets. However, what they thought would be just a one-night stand blossoms into the real thing, which complicates the life that is expected of Kumail by his traditional Muslim parents. When Emily is beset with a mystery illness, it forces Kumail to navigate the medical crisis with her parents, Beth and Terry (Holly Hunter and Ray Romano) who he’s never met, while dealing with the emotional tug-of-war between his family and his heart. THE BIG SICK is directed by Michael Showalter (HELLO MY NAME IS DORIS) and producer by Judd Apatow (TRAINWRECK, THIS IS 40) and Barry Mendel (TRAINWRECK, THE ROYAL TENENBAUMS).

The Big Sick Movie
US-Release: 14 July 2017
Genres: Romance, Comedy
Cast: Zoe Kazan, Kumail Nanjiani, Holly Hunter

item.title: 44 year old Korean singer Shim Mina shows off her impressive pole dancing abilities
item.dc:creator: Engineer
item.description: Shim Mina is a South Korean singer and dancer who rose to fame in 2002 and became a Kpop singer.
item.content:encoded:
Shim Mina is a South Korean singer and dancer who rose to fame in 2002 and became a Kpop singer.

Recently, she was featured on the South Korean TV show ‘Taxi’ where she gave a tour of her house. One of the hosts of the show noticed that Mina had a pole dancing certificate, and she explained that she was a certified pole dancer and even had a pole in one of her rooms.

Mina agreed to give a demonstration of her abilities, and in doing so showed off her amazingly fit body. She is also currently dating a man 17 years younger than her, Kpop idol Ryu Philip.

Check out the video below and also Shim Mina’s Instagram.
